title: enrAvadingu
sahitya:
enrAvadingu ezhundaruLvAi enru Engum manattinait-tAngudid-dEham kaNNA


anupallavi

  kanrOTTi gAnakkuzhal uDi vanattiDai shenrAlum unaik-kANa manrADum enakkirangi


caraNam    angam niram koNDa azhagu yamunaippunal mungiyADa mei shilirkkudE
 tangum maNam kamazhum taN tuLabam kaNDAl tazhuvum mEni kaNamun tOnrudE
 engum vIshum tenral Endi varum ishaiyil enran manam mayangit-tavikkudE
 pankaja malar aruL pongum mukham kATTa mangik-kaNgaL kuLamAgudE
 nenjurai ninnuru nilaikkum uyirAga nAvuraikkum nAmam nALum amudAga
 kenjiyazhaikkum enmum nanjaravADiya kanja malariNai shen shilambolikka
